content: I think I'll go with the avalanche method since it makes the most sense to tackle the debt with the highest interest rate first. I'll try to pay off the credit card debt as aggressively as possible. Can you give me an idea of how long it would take to pay off the credit card debt if I allocate $700 per month towards it? And would it be a good idea to consider a balance transfer to a 0% introductory APR credit card to save on interest?
